note:
56, male, engaged to my own fair lady, and just as happy as I need to be. Classically trained pianist, though only playing bass guitar on a consistent basis, as of yet (intermediate skill or better).

I believe that Jesus taught compassion for those who needed it the most, not obsequiousness towards those who merited it the least. He remains neither merely a legend nor a myth.

My interests vary, but let’s be clear about values, rules, and etiquette, mmkay?

I’m still learning.

fields.name: Beliefs
fields.value: Freedom of Religion, Freedom of Expression, Freedom of Assembly (or Freedom of Association)

fields.name: Interests
fields.value: Internet commerce and sales (at your convenience, kindly share legitimate and lawful ideas only, of course. Otherwise, don’t bother, mmkay? It’s boring)

fields.name: Where I Live
fields.value: USA. ...Specifically, where do I live in the USA? Wait, why does it matter? Wait, does it matter?

fields.name: Most Current Movie Recommendation
fields.value: Paper Man (2009, featuring Jeff Daniels, Emma Stone, Ryan Reynolds, and Lisa Kudrow). He’s a writer. His wife’s a surgeon. She’s successful. He’s getting there (we hope) and he’s got a babysitter . ...Except she‘s actually just house-sitting. Whatever.
